Postgraduate Studies

Postgraduate studies in CAIRO are carried in full research mode

Funding & Scholarships
======================

![](https://research.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2022/08/robotics-illustrated-icon-1.png)

#### Project Research Funding

Project research funding is available based on CAIRO’s research grants.

![](https://research.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2022/08/robotics-illustrated-icon-7.png)

#### UTM Scholarships

Scholarship opportunities by Universiti Teknologi Malaysia. Please refer to this [website](http://www.utm.my/international/scholarship-opportunities/)
 for details.

[UTM Scholarship](http://www.utm.my/international/scholarship-opportunities/)

![](https://research.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2022/08/robotics-illustrated-icon-2.png)

#### MJIIT Scholarship Fund

CAIRO as MJIIT’s i-KOHZA offers advantages to students who register their study in MJIIT. Please refer this [website](http://mjiit.utm.my/postgraduate-scholarship/)
 for scholarship details.

[MJIIT Scholarship Fund](http://mjiit.utm.my/postgraduate-scholarship/)

Application Process
===================

### ![](https://research.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/26/2022/08/robotics-icon-20.png)  
Interested candidates are requested to write a formal email with attachment of the following documents or information :

1) Verified academic transcripts and other supportive certificates;  
2) Resume;  
3) Interested research area- Artificial Intelligence/Robotics/Control;

and email to the [**corresponding researchers**](https://cairo.utm.my/1about-us-2)
 of CAIRO, based on your preferred research area.

To apply for postgraduate study, please refer to UTM’s School of Graduates website for application details.

[School of Graduates](http://www.sps.utm.my/)
